name: Orlando FIORAVANTI, Appellant, v. Jeffrey BEARD, Secretary, Department of Corrections, Appellee

parties: Orlando FIORAVANTI, Appellant, v. Jeffrey BEARD, Secretary, Department of Corrections, Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 4th day of May, 2004, probable jurisdiction is noted and the order appealed is affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
850 A.2d 618
Orlando FIORAVANTI, Appellant, v. Jeffrey BEARD, Secretary, Department of Corrections, Appellee.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
May 4, 2004.
